content: Interesting piece. I think, in terms of Thompson’s Aggregation Theory, your analysis may be conflating UX and CX. Of course the interface is important but as Ben has pointed out himself, Netflix could have the best interface in the world but without content they would struggle to drive customer loyalty and the subsequent 'aggregation' leverage over suppliers. Hence their huge investment in original content. It’s the overall CX that is the key to aggregation and what contributes to this will vary from sector to sector
